pallet-stretch-wrapping-machines.name: Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machines
pallet-stretch-wrapping-machines.description: Secure your palletized loads with our high-performance stretch wrapping machines, ensuring stability and protection during transport.

box-stretch-wrapping-machines.name: Box Stretch Wrapping Machines
box-stretch-wrapping-machines.description: Compact and efficient wrapping solutions for individual boxes and smaller packages.

orbit-stretch-wrapping-machines.name: Orbit Stretch Wrapping Machines
orbit-stretch-wrapping-machines.description: Orbital wrappers designed for securing long, ring-shaped, or irregular products.

standard-taping-machines.name: Standard Taping Machines
standard-taping-machines.description: Reliable carton sealing machines for standard production lines.

autonomous-taping-machines.name: Autonomous Taping Machines
autonomous-taping-machines.description: Fully automated taping solutions for high-speed, unmanned packaging operations.

conveyor.name: Conveyor Systems
conveyor.description: Robust conveyor systems to streamline your material handling and packaging workflow.

lift-auto-door-mechanism-s-series.name: Lift Auto Door Mechanism - S Series
lift-auto-door-mechanism-s-series.description: Premium S-Series lift door mechanisms for smooth and reliable elevator operation.

lift-auto-door-mechanism-f-series.name: Lift Auto Door Mechanism - F Series
lift-auto-door-mechanism-f-series.description: Durable F-Series lift door mechanisms designed for high-traffic commercial elevators.

lift-auto-door-mechanism-parts.name: Lift Auto Door Mechanism - Parts
lift-auto-door-mechanism-parts.description: Genuine spare parts for S-Series and F-Series lift door mechanisms.

LPW100S.name: LPW100S
LPW100S.title: Manual Adjust Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW100S.description: LYNOPACK LPW100S is a semi-automatic manual adjust stretch wrapping machine designed for secure and economical pallet wrapping. It is an ideal solution for warehouses, logistics centers, and small to medium manufacturing units. The machine allows manual adjustment of film tension and wrapping height, ensuring stable load containment making it easy to operate on the shop floor. LPW100S is suitable for wrapping palletized loads of different sizes using standard stretch film. The sturdy construction ensures long service life, while the simple operating mechanism makes it user-friendly and low maintenance.
features: Manual film tension adjustment
Height adjustable mast
Smooth film carriage movement
Heavy-duty base
Easy operation, no power required

LPW100F.name: LPW100F
LPW100F.title: Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW100F.description: The LYNOPACK LPW100F is a pallet stretch wrapping machine designed for reliable and consistent pallet wrapping applications. It is suitable for intensive day-to-day operations while ensuring stable load containment and optimized stretch film usage. Built with a robust structure and user-friendly operation, LPW100F provides precise control over the wrapping process, helping improve packaging efficiency and reduce film wastage. The machine is ideal for warehouses, logistics centers, and manufacturing units looking for a dependable pallet wrapping solution. Designed to meet modern packaging requirements, the LPW100F ensures better load safety during transportation while saving time, labor, and packaging resources.
features: Reliable and consistent wrapping performance
Precise film tension control
Robust structure for heavy-duty use
User-friendly operation
Optimized stretch film usage

LPW200MT.name: LPW200MT
LPW200MT.title: M-Type Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW200MT.description: The LPW200MT M-Type Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine is designed for effortless pallet loading and unloading using a forklift or manual stacker. Its unique "M" shaped turntable allows pallets to enter the machine directly without lifting, reducing manual handling.
features: Easy Loading/Unloading: M-shaped cutout ensures smooth entry for pallet jacks or stackers
Semi-Automatic/Automatic Operation: Simply place the pallet, and the machine wraps it efficiently
Safety & Stability: Photo-eye sensors detect pallet height while the stretch film secures the load for safe transport and storage
Material Efficiency: Power pre-stretch unit optimizes film use, reducing material costs by up to 250%
working_principle: Place the pallet on the M-shaped turntable using a forklift or pallet jack.
Attach the film or let the automated system handle it.
The turntable rotates while the film carriage moves up and down, wrapping the pallet evenly.
Film is cut and secured automatically or manually.
Remove the wrapped pallet for transport.
benefits: No pallet lifting required for loading

LPW300TP.name: LPW300TP
LPW300TP.title: Top Press Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW300TP.description: The LPW300TP Top Press Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine is specially designed to secure lightweight, loose, or uneven pallet loads with maximum stability. It features a top press plate that applies controlled downward pressure during the wrapping cycle, preventing load shifting or toppling during handling and transportation.
features: Top Press Plate: Pneumatically or hydraulically operated plate firmly holds the load from the top during wrapping
Automatic Operation: Automated film wrapping, cutting, and securing reduces manual labor and improves efficiency
High Load Stability: Compresses the load to eliminate gaps, ensuring tight and stable pallet wrapping
Protection: Stretch film provides excellent dust and moisture protection for stored or transported goods
working_principle: The operator places the pallet on the turntable and starts the cycle.
The top press plate descends to secure the load.
The turntable rotates while the film carriage moves vertically, wrapping the pallet evenly.
After wrapping, the top press lifts and the pallet is ready for transport.

LPW100AS.name: LPW100AS
LPW100AS.title: Autonomous Semi Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW100AS.description: LYNOPACK LPW100AS is an advanced semi-automatic stretch wrapping machine designed for efficient, consistent, and secure pallet wrapping. Equipped with automatic film clamping and cutting, it reduces manual intervention and improves productivity, making it ideal for modern warehouses, logistics centers, and manufacturing units. This model offers automatic wrapping cycles with precise film tension control, ensuring excellent load stability and uniform wrapping quality. Its user-friendly control system allows easy operation on the shop floor while maintaining high packaging efficiency. The LPW100AS is suitable for wrapping palletized loads of various sizes using standard stretch film. Built with a robust structure, the machine ensures long service life, low maintenance, and reliable performance in demanding industrial environments.
features: Automatic film clamping and cutting system
Pre-set wrapping programs
Adjustable wrapping height
Smooth and stable film carriage movement
Heavy-duty base construction
User-friendly control panel
Low maintenance and high operational efficiency
Remote operated control system

LPW100AF.name: LPW100AF
LPW100AF.title: Autonomous Fully Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW100AF.description: LYNOPACK LPW100AF is an autonomous, fully automatic pallet stretch wrapping machine designed for maximum efficiency, consistency, and hands-free operation. Compared to the LPW100AS, this advanced model is equipped with an automatic film pasting system, which securely pastes the stretch film at the end of the wrapping cycle, ensuring a clean and professional finish without manual intervention. The machine performs the complete wrapping process automatically—including film clamping, wrapping, cutting, and end-cycle film pasting—delivering superior load stability and reduced operator involvement. Its intelligent control system ensures precise film tension and uniform wrapping for pallets of varying sizes. The LPW100AF is ideal for high-throughput packaging environments where speed, reliability, and consistent wrap quality are critical. Built with a heavy-duty structure, it ensures long service life, low maintenance, and dependable performance.
features: Fully autonomous operation
Automatic film clamping, cutting, and end-cycle film pasting
Advanced control system for precise wrapping
Adjustable wrapping height
Smooth film carriage movement
Heavy-duty base and robust construction
Minimal operator intervention
High productivity with consistent wrapping quality

LPW200AMT.name: LPW200AMT
LPW200AMT.title: Autonomous M-Type Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW200AMT.description: The LYNOPACK LPW200AMT Autonomous M-Type Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine is designed for effortless pallet loading and unloading using a forklift or manual stacker. Its unique "M"-shaped turntable allows direct pallet entry without lifting, significantly reducing manual handling and improving operator safety. This advanced model features fully autonomous operation, including automatic film clamping, cutting, and end-cycle film pasting, ensuring a clean, secure, and professional wrap finish without manual intervention.
features: Easy Loading / Unloading: M-shaped cutout enables smooth entry for pallet jacks and stackers
Fully Autonomous Operation: Automatic wrapping cycle with minimal operator involvement
Auto Film Clamping, Cutting & Pasting: Ensures proper film start and secure film sealing at the end of the cycle
Safety & Stability: Photo-eye sensors automatically detect pallet height for accurate wrapping
Material Efficiency: Power pre-stretch unit optimizes stretch film usage, reducing material costs by up to 250%
Consistent Wrapping Quality: Uniform tension and tight load containment for safe transport and storage
working_principle: Place the pallet on the M-shaped turntable using a forklift or pallet jack
Start the cycle; the machine automatically clamps the film
The turntable rotates while the film carriage moves vertically, wrapping the pallet evenly
At the end of the cycle, the film is automatically cut and pasted securely
Remove the wrapped pallet, ready for transport or storage
benefits: Highly efficient and safe pallet wrapping

LPW300ATP.name: LPW300ATP
LPW300ATP.title: Autonomous Top Press Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW300ATP.description: The LYNOPACK LPW300ATP Autonomous Top Press Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine is designed to secure lightweight, loose, or uneven pallet loads with maximum stability and fully hands-free operation. It combines a top press plate with fully autonomous stretch wrapping, ensuring superior load containment during handling and transportation. This advanced model features automatic film clamping, cutting, and end-cycle film pasting, delivering a clean, secure wrap finish without manual intervention. The top press system applies controlled downward pressure throughout the wrapping cycle, preventing load shifting or toppling.
features: Top Press Plate: Pneumatically or hydraulically operated plate firmly holds the load from the top during wrapping
Fully Autonomous Operation: Complete automatic wrapping cycle with minimal operator involvement
Auto Film Clamping, Cutting & Pasting: Ensures proper film start and secure film sealing at the end of the cycle
High Load Stability: Compresses loads to eliminate gaps, ensuring tight and stable pallet wrapping
Advanced Safety System: Photo-eye sensors automatically detect pallet height for precise wrapping
Protection: Stretch film provides excellent dust and moisture protection during storage and transit
Consistent Wrapping Quality: Uniform film tension for professional packaging results
working_principle: The operator places the pallet on the turntable and starts the cycle
The top press plate descends to securely hold the load
The turntable rotates while the film carriage moves vertically, wrapping the pallet evenly
At the end of the cycle, the film is automatically cut and pasted
The top press lifts, and the wrapped pallet is ready for transport
benefits: Maximum load integrity, safety, and productivity
Superior load containment for unstable loads

LPW100ARA.name: LPW100ARA
LPW100ARA.title: Autonomous Rotary Arm Fully Automatic Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW100ARA.description: The LYNOPACK LPW100ARA is an autonomous rotary arm pallet stretch wrapping machine designed for high-throughput, space-efficient, and fully automatic pallet packaging. Unlike traditional turntable machines, the rotary arm rotates the film carriage around a stationary pallet, making it ideal for heavy, unstable, or very light loads that cannot be rotated safely.
core_functionality: Rotary Arm Wrapping System: The wrapping arm rotates smoothly around the pallet while the load remains stationary, ensuring stable and uniform film application.
Fully Automatic & Autonomous Operation: Automatic film clamping, cutting, and secure tail pasting eliminate manual intervention and improve cycle consistency.
No Pallet Rotation Required: Ideal for fragile, heavy, or irregular loads that may topple on turntable-based machines.
features: Autonomous Operation: Auto film clamping, cutting, and end-of-cycle pasting
Power Pre-Stretch Unit: Optimizes film usage and reduces stretch film consumption
Photo-Eye Sensor: Automatically detects pallet height for precise wrapping
PLC Controlled System: Ensures consistent performance and easy operation
Heavy-Duty Rotary Arm: Designed for continuous industrial use
Enhanced Safety: Integrated safety sensors and emergency stop system
working_principle: The pallet is positioned in the wrapping zone using a forklift or conveyor.
The film is automatically clamped to the pallet base.
The rotary arm rotates around the stationary load while the film carriage moves vertically.
Stretch film is applied evenly with controlled tension for maximum load stability.
At cycle completion, the film is automatically cut and securely pasted.
The wrapped pallet is ready for transport or storage.
applications: Heavy, fragile, or unstable pallet loads
benefits: Eliminates load instability caused by pallet rotation
Suitable for high-speed and continuous packaging lines
Reduces labor dependency and operational errors
Ensures superior load containment and protection

LPW200ART.name: LPW200ART
LPW200ART.title: Autonomous Ring Type High-Speed Fully Automatic Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW200ART.description: The LYNOPACK LPW200ART is an autonomous ring type pallet stretch wrapping machine engineered for high-speed, continuous, and fully automatic pallet packaging operations. Its advanced rotating ring technology enables extremely fast and consistent wrapping, making it ideal for high-volume production lines and automated logistics environments.
core_functionality: Ring Type Wrapping System: A high-speed rotating ring carries the film carriage around a stationary pallet, ensuring uniform wrapping without rotating the load.
Fully Automatic & Autonomous Operation: Automatic film clamping, cutting, and secure end-of-cycle pasting eliminate manual handling and maximize productivity.
Stationary Pallet Wrapping: Heavy, unstable, or fragile pallets remain fixed during wrapping, ensuring superior load stability.
features: High-Speed Wrapping Performance: Designed for continuous, high-throughput pallet wrapping
Power Pre-Stretch System: Optimizes film usage and significantly reduces material consumption
PLC & HMI Control Panel: User-friendly operation with programmable wrapping cycles
Automatic Height Detection: Photo-eye sensors adjust wrapping height precisely
Heavy-Duty Ring Structure: Built for long-life industrial operation
Advanced Safety System: Safety fencing, sensors, and emergency stops for operator protection
working_principle: The pallet is conveyed or positioned into the wrapping station.
The film is automatically clamped to the pallet base.
The rotating ring spins at high speed around the stationary pallet while the film carriage moves vertically.
Stretch film is applied with controlled tension for maximum load containment.
At the end of the cycle, the film is automatically cut and securely pasted.
The wrapped pallet exits the machine, ready for storage or dispatch.
applications: High-volume FMCG and food & beverage plants
Heavy, tall, or unstable pallet loads
benefits: Extremely high wrapping speed and throughput
Zero load rotation ensures maximum stability
Reduced film consumption and operational cost
Seamless integration with automated production lines
Minimal manual intervention and consistent wrap quality

LPW300AO.name: LPW300AO
LPW300AO.title: Autonomous Online Fully Automatic Pallet Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW300AO.description: The LYNOPACK LPW300AO is an autonomous online pallet stretch wrapping machine designed for fully automatic, continuous, and high-efficiency pallet packaging. This model is engineered to operate inline with conveyor systems, eliminating manual pallet handling and making it ideal for modern automated production and logistics facilities.
core_functionality: Online Inline Wrapping System: The machine integrates directly into conveyor lines, allowing pallets to enter, wrap, and exit automatically without forklift intervention.
Fully Automatic & Autonomous Operation: Automatic film clamping, cutting, and secure end-of-cycle pasting ensure consistent wrapping with zero manual input.
Continuous Production Flow: Designed for nonstop operation, supporting high-volume packaging environments.
features: Power Pre-Stretch Film Unit: Reduces stretch film consumption while maintaining strong load containment
PLC & HMI Control System: Enables programmable wrapping cycles and easy operation
Automatic Pallet Height Detection: Photo-eye sensors ensure accurate wrapping for varying pallet heights
Heavy-Duty Industrial Construction: Built for long-term, continuous use
Advanced Safety System: Safety guards, interlocks, and emergency stop functions
Seamless Automation Integration: Compatible with conveyors, palletizers, and warehouse automation systems
working_principle: Pallets arrive automatically via conveyor into the wrapping station.
The film is automatically clamped at the pallet base.
The wrapping system applies stretch film uniformly around the pallet while it remains in position.
After wrapping, the film is automatically cut and securely pasted.
The wrapped pallet exits the machine and continues along the conveyor line.
applications: FMCG and food & beverage manufacturing plants
benefits: Eliminates manual pallet handling and wrapping labor
Increases line efficiency and packaging throughput
Reduces film usage and operating costs
Ideal for fully automated packaging lines

LPW100SB.name: LPW100SB
LPW100SB.title: Semi-Automatic Box Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW100SB.description: The LYNOPACK LPW100SB is a semi-automatic box stretch wrapping machine designed as a cost-effective and compact packaging solution for lightweight and uniform cartons. This model is engineered without a pre-stretch unit and without height travel, making it ideal for businesses seeking simple operation, low power consumption, and reliable wrapping performance.
core_functionality: Wrapping-Only Operation: The box is placed on the rotating turntable while the stretch film is applied at a fixed height, ensuring consistent wrapping for standard box sizes.
No Pre-Stretch System: Film stretching is achieved through manual tension control, using resistance from the film roll instead of a motorized pre-stretch mechanism.
Fixed Film Carriage (No Height Travel): The film dispenser remains at a fixed position, making the machine best suited for box heights equal to or less than the film roll width.
features: Adjustable turntable speed via VFD control
Manual film tension adjustment
Heavy-duty turntable for smooth rotation
Compact footprint for easy installation
Low power consumption with single-phase 220V supply
applications: Low-volume packaging operations (20–40 boxes per hour)
benefits: Simple, economical, and reliable box wrapping solution
Ideal for small businesses, warehouses, and logistics operations

LPW200FB.name: LPW200FB
LPW200FB.title: Fully Automatic Box Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW200FB.description: The LYNOPACK LPW200FB is a fully automatic box stretch wrapping machine designed for high-efficiency, uniform, and professional carton wrapping. Equipped with a power pre-stretch unit and automatic up-down film carriage movement, this model ensures consistent wrapping quality, improved load stability, and reduced stretch film consumption.
core_functionality: Fully Automatic Wrapping Operation: Automatic film clamping, wrapping, cutting, and secure end-cycle sealing ensure hands-free operation and high productivity.
Power Pre-Stretch Unit: Motorized pre-stretch system optimizes film usage, delivering strong load containment while significantly reducing material cost.
Automatic Up-Down Film Carriage: The film carriage moves vertically during the wrapping cycle, allowing efficient wrapping of boxes with different heights.
features: Fully automatic operation with minimal operator intervention
Power pre-stretch system for reduced film consumption
Automatic vertical (up-down) film carriage movement
PLC controlled system with user-friendly HMI
Consistent and uniform wrapping tension
Heavy-duty construction for continuous operation
Low maintenance and reliable performance
working_principle: The box is placed on the turntable or conveyed into the wrapping station.
The film is automatically clamped at the base of the box.
The turntable rotates while the film carriage moves up and down, wrapping the box evenly.
Stretch film is applied with controlled tension using the pre-stretch unit.
At the end of the cycle, the film is automatically cut and securely sealed.
The wrapped box is ready for storage or dispatch.
benefits: Reduced stretch film usage and operating cost
Improved product protection against dust and moisture
Suitable for medium to high-volume packaging operations

LPW300TPB.name: LPW300TPB
LPW300TPB.title: Top Press Box Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW300TPB.description: The LYNOPACK LPW300TPB is a top press box stretch wrapping machine designed to securely wrap lightweight, loose, or unstable boxes with maximum stability. It features a top press system that applies controlled downward pressure during the wrapping cycle, preventing box movement and ensuring a tight, uniform wrap.
core_functionality: Top Press Stabilization: The top press plate holds the box firmly from above while wrapping, eliminating shifting or tilting during rotation.
Consistent Box Wrapping: Ensures uniform stretch film application, improving load stability and professional packaging quality.
Enhanced Protection: Stretch film provides excellent protection against dust, moisture, and handling damage.
features: Pneumatic or hydraulic top press plate for stable box positioning
Automatic wrapping cycle for consistent results
Uniform film tension control for tight wrapping
Suitable for lightweight and irregular boxes
Heavy-duty base construction for smooth operation
User-friendly control panel
Low maintenance and reliable performance
working_principle: The box is placed on the turntable.
The top press plate descends to secure the box.
The turntable rotates while stretch film is applied evenly around the box.
After wrapping, the top press plate lifts.
The wrapped box is ready for storage or dispatch.
benefits: Ensures tight, stable, and professional packaging

LPW100AHO.name: LPW100AHO
LPW100AHO.title: Autonomous Horizontal Orbit Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW100AHO.description: The LYNOPACK LPW100AHO is an autonomous horizontal orbit stretch wrapping machine designed for efficient, secure, and fully automatic wrapping of long, flat, or bundled products. Unlike pallet wrapping machines, this model uses a horizontal orbital wrapping system, where stretch film is applied by a rotating ring while the product moves or remains positioned on a conveyor.
core_functionality: Horizontal Orbital Wrapping System: A rotating ring carries the stretch film around the product horizontally, ensuring uniform wrapping along the entire length.
Autonomous Fully Automatic Operation: Automatic film clamping, cutting, and secure end-cycle sealing eliminate manual handling and ensure consistent wrapping quality.
Continuous Flow Packaging: Designed for inline operation, making it suitable for high-efficiency and continuous production lines.
features: Autonomous operation with minimal operator intervention
Automatic film clamping, cutting, and sealing
Power pre-stretch system for optimized film consumption
PLC & HMI control system for easy operation and programmable wrapping cycles
Heavy-duty orbital ring structure for long-term industrial use
Adjustable wrapping speed and overlap
Advanced safety system with sensors and emergency stops
working_principle: The product is placed on or fed through the conveyor into the wrapping zone.
The film is automatically clamped to the product.
The orbital ring rotates horizontally around the product, applying stretch film evenly.
After wrapping is completed, the film is automatically cut and securely sealed.
The wrapped product exits the machine, ready for storage or dispatch.
benefits: Uniform and secure wrapping for long or flat products
Reduced film usage and operational costs
Improved product protection against dust and moisture
Seamless integration with conveyor-based production lines

LPW200AVC.name: LPW200AVC
LPW200AVC.title: Autonomous Vertical Coil Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW200AVC.description: The LYNOPACK LPW200AVC is an autonomous vertical coil stretch wrapping machine designed for secure, uniform, and fully automatic wrapping of metal and non-metal coils. This machine applies stretch film vertically around the coil, ensuring excellent load stability, surface protection, and safe handling during storage and transportation.
core_functionality: Vertical Coil Wrapping System: Stretch film is wrapped vertically around the coil circumference, providing complete coverage and tight containment.
Autonomous Fully Automatic Operation: Automatic film clamping, cutting, and end-cycle sealing eliminate manual intervention and ensure consistent wrapping quality.
Heavy-Duty Coil Handling: Designed to handle heavy and bulky coils safely and efficiently.
features: Fully autonomous operation with minimal operator involvement
Automatic film clamping, cutting, and sealing
Power pre-stretch unit to optimize film usage and reduce material cost
PLC & HMI control system for easy operation and programmable wrapping cycles
Adjustable wrapping tension and overlap
Robust industrial construction for continuous operation
Advanced safety system with sensors and emergency stop functions
working_principle: The coil is positioned on the wrapping station using a crane or forklift.
The stretch film is automatically clamped.
The wrapping mechanism rotates vertically around the coil, applying stretch film evenly.
Controlled tension ensures tight and secure wrapping.
After completion, the film is automatically cut and sealed.
The wrapped coil is ready for storage or dispatch.
benefits: Provides excellent coil stability and surface protection
Prevents damage from dust, moisture, and handling
Reduces labor dependency and packaging time
Suitable for heavy-duty and industrial packaging environments

LPW200AHC.name: LPW200AHC
LPW200AHC.title: Autonomous Horizontal Coil Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW200AHC.description: The LYNOPACK LPW200AHC is an autonomous horizontal coil stretch wrapping machine designed for efficient, secure, and fully automatic wrapping of coils positioned in a horizontal orientation. This machine is ideal for coils that must remain horizontally placed during the wrapping process, ensuring safe handling, uniform film application, and excellent load stability.
core_functionality: Horizontal Coil Wrapping System: The coil is placed horizontally on support rollers, while the wrapping mechanism rotates stretch film around the coil's circumference.
Fully Autonomous Operation: Automatic film clamping, cutting, and secure end-cycle sealing eliminate manual handling and ensure consistent wrapping quality.
Stable Coil Handling: Horizontal positioning prevents deformation and allows safe wrapping of heavy or delicate coils.
features: Autonomous fully automatic operation
Automatic film clamping, cutting, and sealing
Power pre-stretch unit for optimized film consumption
PLC & HMI control system
Adjustable wrapping speed and tension
Heavy-duty horizontal support rollers
Robust industrial construction
Advanced safety system
working_principle: The coil is placed horizontally on the support rollers.
Film is automatically clamped.
The wrapping system rotates around the coil, applying stretch film evenly.
Film is cut and sealed automatically after wrapping.
Wrapped coil is ready for dispatch.
applications: Tyre industry (tyre bead coils, tyre wire coils)
benefits: Perfect solution for tyre manufacturing and tyre component packaging
Safe horizontal wrapping for heavy coils
Excellent protection against dust and moisture

LPW300AR.name: LPW300AR
LPW300AR.title: Autonomous Reel Stretch Wrapping Machine
LPW300AR.description: The LYNOPACK LPW300AR is an autonomous reel stretch wrapping machine engineered for secure, uniform, and high-efficiency wrapping of reels and spools. Designed for fully automatic operation, this machine ensures consistent film application while maintaining reel integrity during storage, handling, and transportation.
core_functionality: Reel-Specific Wrapping System: Designed to wrap reels positioned on dedicated support rollers, allowing smooth rotation and even film coverage across the reel surface.
Fully Autonomous Operation: Automatic film clamping, stretching, cutting, and end-cycle sealing eliminate manual intervention and ensure repeatable wrapping quality.
Optimized Film Usage: Integrated power pre-stretch unit reduces film consumption while maintaining strong load containment.
features: Autonomous fully automatic operation
Automatic film clamping, cutting, and sealing
Power pre-stretch unit for material savings
PLC & HMI touch-screen control system
Adjustable wrapping speed and film tension
Heavy-duty reel support rollers
Robust industrial structure for continuous operation
Integrated safety guards and emergency systems
working_principle: The reel is placed on the support rollers.
Film is automatically clamped at the start of the cycle.
The reel rotates while stretch film is applied uniformly.
Film is cut and securely sealed at cycle completion.
The wrapped reel is ready for storage or dispatch.
benefits: Efficient packaging with reduced film wastage
Ideal for high-volume and continuous operations

LPT100M.name: LPT100M
LPT100M.title: Mini Case Sealing Machine
LPT100M.description: The LYNOPACK LPT100M Mini Case Sealing Machine is a compact and efficient solution designed specifically for sealing small and minimum-size cartons with high consistency and reliability. This semi-automatic machine streamlines packaging operations by applying adhesive tape neatly and securely, ensuring carton integrity during storage and transportation.
features: Designed for Small Cartons with precision
Semi-Automatic Operation with automatic tape application
Consistent Tape Application for professional sealing
Compact & Space-Saving Design
User-Friendly Operation with minimal training

LPT200S.name: LPT200S
LPT200S.title: Semi Automatic Case Sealer
LPT200S.description: The LYNOPACK LPT200S Semi Automatic Case Sealer is a reliable carton sealing solution designed to seal the top and bottom flaps of corrugated cartons using adhesive tape. It operates on a semi-automatic principle, where carton flaps are folded manually and the machine automatically applies and cuts the tape.
features: Semi-Automatic Operation with automatic tape cutting
Manual Size Adjustment for varied carton dimensions
Top & Bottom Sealing for strong, uniform seals
Durable Construction with heavy-duty steel frame
Improved Packaging Efficiency
Easy Mobility with caster wheels
benefits: Excellent balance of efficiency and flexibility

LPT300F.name: LPT300F
LPT300F.title: Fully Automatic Case Sealer
LPT300F.description: The LYNOPACK LPT300F Fully Automatic Case Sealer is an advanced carton sealing machine designed to automatically close and seal the top and bottom flaps of corrugated cartons using adhesive tape. Equipped with an automatic flap closing mechanism, this machine eliminates manual intervention.
features: Fully Automatic Operation with no manual assistance
Automatic Flap Closing System for uniform closure
Top & Bottom Sealing for strong, professional carton sealing
Automatic Size Adjustment for uniform dimensions
Heavy-Duty Construction with robust steel frame
High-Speed & Efficient operation
Line Integration Ready for conveyors and automated lines
benefits: Seamless integration into automated packaging lines

LPT100ARS.name: LPT100ARS
LPT100ARS.title: Autonomous Random Semi-Automatic Case Sealer
LPT100ARS.description: The LYNOPACK LPT100ARS Autonomous Random Semi-Automatic Case Sealer is an advanced carton sealing solution designed for random carton sizes with minimal operator intervention. Part of the LYNOPACK Autonomous Series, this machine automatically adjusts both carton width and height.
features: Autonomous Random Size Adjustment with automatic width and height detection
Semi-Automatic Operation with operator feeding capability
Air-Assisted Tape Support System for pneumatic positioning
Top & Bottom Sealing for strong, uniform seals
Autonomous Series Design with reduced human dependency
Heavy-Duty Industrial Construction
Higher Productivity for lines with frequent size changes
benefits: Consistent sealing quality with minimal effort
Ideal for modern, fast-paced packaging operations

LPT200ARF.name: LPT200ARF
LPT200ARF.title: Autonomous Random Fully Automatic Case Sealer
LPT200ARF.description: The LYNOPACK LPT200ARF Autonomous Random Fully Automatic Case Sealer is a high-performance carton sealing solution engineered for random carton sizes and fully automated packaging lines. This model automatically adjusts to varying carton width and height and features an integrated automatic flap closing system.
features: Autonomous Random Size Adjustment without manual setting
Fully Automatic Operation with carton conveying
Automatic Flap Closing System for uniform closure
Air-Assisted Tape Application for smooth sealing
Top & Bottom Sealing for professional packaging
Autonomous Series Architecture for mixed carton sizes
Heavy-Duty Industrial Construction

specifications.flap_closing: Fully automatic top flap folding unit

benefits: Random size flexibility with full automation

LPT300ACE.name: LPT300ACE
LPT300ACE.title: Autonomous Corner Edge Case Sealer
LPT300ACE.description: The LYNOPACK LPT300ACE Autonomous Corner Edge Case Sealer is a specialized carton sealing machine designed to reinforce the vertical edges and corner seams of cartons using adhesive tape. Unlike standard case sealers, this machine applies tape on the side edges and corners.
features: Corner & Edge Sealing for vertical side edges
Autonomous Operation with minimal intervention
Enhanced Carton Strength preventing edge crushing
High Adhesion & Precision taping
Heavy-Duty Construction for continuous operation
Line Integration Ready with top & bottom sealers

LPT400ARCF.name: LPT400ARCF
LPT400ARCF.title: Autonomous Robotics Case Forming Machine
LPT400ARCF.description: The LYNOPACK LPT400ARCF Autonomous Robotics Case Forming Machine is a next-generation packaging solution designed to automatically pick, form, and bottom-seal cartons using a robotic arm. This advanced system can handle multiple carton sizes on the same production line without mechanical changeover.
key_features: Robotic Case Forming System with automatic positioning
Multi-Size Carton Handling without changeovers
Autonomous Operation with full automation
features: Robotic arm picks and forms carton blanks
Automatic Bottom Sealing with tape or hot-melt
Fully Automated Workflow minimizing operator intervention
High-Speed Performance with robotic precision
Intelligent Control System with PLC and HMI
Line Integration Ready with filling and sealing equipment

specifications.machine_type: Robotic Case Former with Bottom Sealing
specifications.carton_handling: Multiple sizes on single production line

key_advantages: Higher Line Speed with robotic precision

LPC100BC.name: LPC100BC
LPC100BC.title: Belt Conveyor
LPC100BC.description: The LYNOPACK LPC100BC Belt Conveyor is a versatile and fully customizable material handling solution designed to meet diverse industrial and packaging line requirements. Engineered for smooth, reliable, and continuous product movement.
key_features: Fully Customizable Dimensions per requirement
Belt Color Customization available
Custom Belt & Frame Material options
Smooth & Stable Operation with minimal vibration
Automation Ready with sensor integration
features: Customizable width, length, and height
Multiple belt color options
Custom belt and conveyor structure materials
Consistent product flow with low noise
Automation integration capability
Heavy-Duty Construction for long service life
Easy line integration with all packaging equipment

LPC100CT.name: LPC100CT
LPC100CT.title: Cross Transfer Conveyor
LPC100CT.description: The LYNOPACK LPC100CT Cross Transfer Conveyor is an advanced material handling solution designed to transfer products laterally (90-degree direction) between conveyor lines. It enables smooth, controlled, and automated product diversion without interrupting main conveyor flow.
key_mechanisms: Pop-Up Transfer Mechanism with controlled actuation
Lifting transfer unit positioned below main rollers
conveyor_types: Roller-to-Belt Cross Transfer for cartons and boxes
Roller-to-Chain Cross Transfer for heavy loads
Lift-and-Carry Transfer System for heavy fabrication
features: 90-Degree directional transfer capability
Powered roller and belt/chain systems
Pneumatic, hydraulic or electric actuation
Intelligent PLC control with sensor feedback
High throughput capacity
Space optimization capability
Enhanced safety features
benefits: Minimizes operator fatigue and injury risks

LPC100FR.name: LPC100FR
LPC100FR.title: Flexible Roller Conveyor
LPC100FR.description: The LYNOPACK LPC100FR Flexible Roller Conveyor is a highly adaptable material handling solution designed for dynamic warehouse, packaging, and dispatch operations. Its flexible, expandable, and curved structure allows quick adjustment to changing layouts.

gravity.title: Gravity Flexible Roller Conveyor (Cost-Effective & Portable)
gravity.description: Operates without a motor using natural movement of cartons over rollers
features: No power required (energy-saving)
Flexible, expandable & curved design
Height adjustable for ergonomic operation
Lockable castor wheels for mobility
Low maintenance & long service life

powered.title: Powered Flexible Roller Conveyor (High Efficiency & Continuous Flow)
powered.description: Equipped with motor-driven roller system for controlled movement
features: Motorized rollers for smooth, consistent flow
Variable speed control (optional)
Handles heavier and high-volume loads
Flexible layout with powered performance
Integration with automated systems

benefits: Perfect combination of flexibility and portability
Available in gravity and powered versions
Improves efficiency and reduces manual effort

LPC100PT.name: LPC100PT
LPC100PT.title: Pallet Turntable Conveyor
LPC100PT.description: The LYNOPACK LPC100PT Pallet Turntable Conveyor is an advanced material handling solution designed to rotate pallets smoothly and accurately within an automated or semi-automated conveyor line. It allows pallets to change direction without manual handling.
key_features: Rotational Pallet Transfer at 90°, 180°, or 360°
Heavy-Duty Turntable Platform for high load capacity
Powered Rotation System with reliable motor drive
Seamless Conveyor Integration
Accurate Positioning with sensor control
Automation Ready with PLC operation
features: Multiple rotation angles for directional change
Compatible with roller, chain, and belt conveyors
Precise pallet alignment after rotation
Sensor-based sequencing for safety
Smooth and controlled rotation
Heavy-duty industrial performance
technical_highlights: Conveyor Type: Pallet Turntable Conveyor
Rotation Angles: 90° / 180° / 360° (as per requirement)
Load Capacity: Suitable for heavy pallets
Drive System: Motorized
Control: PLC / Control Panel
Construction: Heavy-duty Mild Steel
Surface Type: Roller / Chain / Flat Plate (as required)
key_benefits: Supports fully automated pallet handling systems

LPC100PR.name: LPC100PR
LPC100PR.title: Power Roller Conveyor
LPC100PR.description: The LYNOPACK LPC100PR Power Roller Conveyor is a robust and efficient material handling solution designed for the controlled movement of cartons, boxes, trays, and palletized loads across production, packaging, and warehouse environments.
key_features: Powered Roller Drive System with motor-driven rollers
Heavy-Duty Construction with strong mild steel frame

JLT-S-Center-Car.name: JLT-S-Center-Car
JLT-S-Center-Car.title: Centre Opening Car Header
JLT-S-Center-Car.description: A Centre Opening Car Header is a critical mechanical assembly used in elevator car door systems, designed to support and guide two door panels that open symmetrically from the center. This configuration ensures smooth, balanced, and synchronized door movement.
key_features: Centre Opening Mechanism with two door panels
Precision Guide Tracks & Rollers
Robust Construction in high-strength materials
Smooth & Safe Operation
features: Two door panels opening equally from center
Ensures low-noise, vibration-free operation
Manufactured using high-strength materials
Works seamlessly with elevator operators
Optimized for limited headroom
technical_highlights: Door Type: Centre Opening (2 Panels)
Mounting Position: Top of Elevator Car Entrance
Material: MS / Aluminum / SS (as per requirement)
Compatibility: Passenger, Hospital & Service Elevators
Operation: Motorized via door operator system
JLT-S-Center-Car.category_name: Lift Auto Door Mechanism - S Series

JLT-S-Center-Landing.name: JLT-S-Center-Landing
JLT-S-Center-Landing.title: Centre Opening Landing Header
JLT-S-Center-Landing.description: A Centre Opening Landing Header is a key structural and guiding component of an elevator landing door system, designed to support and guide two landing door panels that open symmetrically from the center. It ensures smooth, synchronized, and safe door movement at each floor level.
key_features: Centre Opening Configuration with symmetric movement
High-Precision Guide System for stable operation
Strong & Durable Construction
Perfect Door Synchronization
Space-Efficient Design
features: Two landing door panels opening equally from center
Ensures stable, vibration-free movement
Made from high-grade steel/aluminum sections
Works seamlessly with car door operators
Compact profile for standard elevator shafts
technical_highlights: Door Type: Centre Opening Landing Doors (2 Panels)
Installation Location: Landing / Floor Level
Material Options: MS / Aluminum / SS (as per project requirement)
Compatibility: Passenger, Hospital, Commercial & Service Elevators
Operation: Mechanical coupling with car door operator
key_benefits: Smooth and synchronized landing door operation
JLT-S-Center-Landing.category_name: Lift Auto Door Mechanism - S Series

JLT-S-Telescopic-Car.name: JLT-S-Telescopic-Car
JLT-S-Telescopic-Car.title: Telescopic Opening Car Header
JLT-S-Telescopic-Car.description: A Telescopic Opening Car Header is a precision-engineered structural and guiding assembly designed for multi-panel telescopic elevator car doors, where door panels slide and stack behind one another to achieve maximum clear opening within limited shaft space.
key_features: Telescopic Door Configuration for multi-panel systems
Maximum Clear Opening in compact spaces
High-Precision Guide & Roller System
Robust & Durable Construction
Smooth Synchronization
features: Supports 2-panel, 3-panel or multi-panel telescopic doors
Delivers wider entrance opening than centre-opening
Ensures smooth sliding with low friction
Manufactured from high-strength materials
Perfect coordination with landing door systems
technical_highlights: Door Type: Telescopic Opening Car Doors
Installation Location: Elevator Car (Top Header Assembly)
Panel Support: 2 / 3 / Multi-panel telescopic doors
Material Options: MS / Aluminum / Stainless Steel
Operation: Mechanical linkage with door operator
applications: Hospital & Bed Lifts with stretchers & wheelchairs
key_benefits: Wider door opening in limited shaft width
JLT-S-Telescopic-Car.category_name: Lift Auto Door Mechanism - S Series

JLT-S-Telescopic-Landing.name: JLT-S-Telescopic-Landing
JLT-S-Telescopic-Landing.title: Telescopic Opening Landing Header
JLT-S-Telescopic-Landing.description: A Telescopic Opening Landing Header is a robust and precisely engineered structural assembly designed to support multi-panel telescopic elevator landing doors. It works in perfect synchronization with the telescopic car door system to ensure smooth, safe, and accurate door operation.
key_features: Telescopic Door Support for multi-panel systems

High Strength Construction for durability
Accurate Door Alignment with car doors
Safety Integration Ready for sensors

Made from heavy-duty steel or aluminum profiles

Designed to accommodate door locks and sensors

Material Options: MS / Aluminum / Stainless Steel

JLT-F-Center-Car.name: JLT-F-Center-Car
JLT-F-Center-Car.title: Centre Opening Car Header
JLT-F-Center-Car.description: The JLT – F Series Centre Opening Car Header is a precision-engineered component designed for centre opening elevator car doors, ensuring smooth, synchronized, and reliable door operation inside the lift cabin. This car header assembly supports two door panels that open equally from the center.

Smooth and silent door travel with precise alignment
Strong and durable construction for long-term reliability
Stable performance with minimal vibration
Easy integration with standard car door operator systems

JLT-F-Center-Landing.name: JLT-F-Center-Landing
JLT-F-Center-Landing.title: Centre Opening Landing Header

This landing header supports two door panels opening simultaneously from the center.

JLT-F-Telescopic-Car.name: JLT-F-Telescopic-Car
JLT-F-Telescopic-Car.title: Telescopic Opening Car Header
JLT-F-Telescopic-Car.description: The JLT – F Series Telescopic Opening Car Header is engineered for telescopic elevator car doors, enabling smooth and sequential opening of multiple door panels within the lift cabin. This car header assembly supports telescopic door movement for wider clear opening within compact installation space.

JLT-Parts-S.name: JLT-Parts-S
JLT-Parts-S.title: Spare Parts for S-Series
JLT-Parts-S.description: The JLT – S Series Car & Landing Door Spare Parts section is designed to help customers identify and source genuine spare parts used in S Series elevator car and landing door systems. All parts are manufactured to ensure proper fitment, smooth operation, and reliable performance.
JLT-Parts-S.purpose: Replacement, maintenance, and refurbishment of existing elevator installations
features: Suitable for S Series car and landing doors
Used for maintenance, repair, and replacement purposes
Designed to match original specifications and dimensions
Ensures smooth door movement and long service life
Helps maintain safe and reliable elevator operation

JLT-Parts-F.name: JLT-Parts-F
JLT-Parts-F.title: Spare Parts for F-Series
JLT-Parts-F.description: The JLT – F Series Car & Landing Door Spare Parts section is created to help customers easily identify and procure genuine spare parts used in F Series elevator car and landing door systems. All parts are designed for F Series door assemblies and manufactured to deliver precise fitment and dependable long-term performance.
